org.convertertopdf.convert

Class OfficeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.convertertopdf.convert.AbstractConverter
      • org.convertertopdf.convert.OfficeConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocConverter, DocxConverter, OdtConverter, RtfConverter

    public abstract class OfficeConverter
extends AbstractConverter
    Abstract class that is responsible for providing operations to convert office files files to PDF. Office files: doc, docx, odt, rtf files to PDF.
    Author:
    Thiago Leite e-mail: thiagoleiteecarvalho@gmail.com
